categories.description: This email is from a potential customer or client who is expressing interest in our products, services, or solutions for the first time. It may contain inquiries about features, pricing, demos, or partnership opportunities and typically comes from someone not yet in our system.  Examples include: 	Requests for product demos,	Questions about pricing

his email is from an existing or potential vendor/supplier providing services, tools, platforms, or products to our company. It may include invoices, service updates, account-related communication, partnership proposals, or technical support related to their offerings.  Examples include: 	•	Billing or invoicing from a software provider 	•	Updates or maintenance notifications from vendors 	•	Vendor onboarding or compliance requests 	•	Technical support or account management from platforms we use

This email contains specific questions, technical queries, or problem statements related to our products, services, or processes. It may come from existing clients, partners, or prospects and is intended to seek help, clarification, or support.  Examples include: “Can we automation this?” 	“I need to implement automation in my company” “How can I learn automation”

parameters.content:

Like Company Mail ID
